Class RgbSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • iGEM2017.RgbSensor

  • public class RgbSensor
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls a color (RGB) sensor

      • readingToHue

        public java.awt.Color readingToHue(RgbSensor.ColorReading cr)

      • setWhitePoint

        public void setWhitePoint()
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Takes a reading and sets that to the color point 255,255,255. Raw readings will not be altered, but normalized readings will be scaled assuming the current white point.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If hardware failure during reading process

      • setGain

        public void setGain(int gain)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Sets the gain (hardware amplification) of readings.
        Parameters:
        gain - amount of amplification
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is a hardware I/O error
